\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rThe B \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rThe C Below is the diagram showing it.  \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":146875,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/7d7f929b-6b69-49ed-87a9-6dc75af7b939/Capture13.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/7d7f929b-6b69-49ed-87a9-6dc75af7b939/Capture13.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Capture13.PNG\",\"name\":\"Capture13.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"7d7f929b-6b69-49ed-87a9-6dc75af7b939\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1029,\"height\":452.68391866913123},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"What we would like to highlight is that B-track is managerial and focuses on one's ability to work in any work ambiguity, manage project teams, bring expertise across various topics as well as be able to manage client engagement and drive value creation. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"D&A Manager at EPAM means more than being a contributor on internal or external projects. In fact, a manager is a specialist which has many hats or responsibilities. It is not obligatory to have all of them, yet it is highly encouraged by D&A Leadership to contribute to several buckets, helping the Practice grow further. The picture below shows six key responsibility buckets of D&A Manager. All details we will describe below.  \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":234464,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/de5c566d-40e6-4b3e-aa57-22f49d2fb25d/Capture14.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/de5c566d-40e6-4b3e-aa57-22f49d2fb25d/Capture14.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Capture14.PNG\",\"name\":\"Capture14.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"de5c566d-40e6-4b3e-aa57-22f49d2fb25d\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":835,\"height\":468},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Participation in all activities impacts your assessment & career growth \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"What are these six key responsibilities -
